title: Life in the Fast Lane
description: This fast-paced young adult novel tells the tale of a teen who can't really find her place until a new girl moves into town. In a world full of temptation, Jessica gets into more trouble than she bargained for. A must-read young adult novel of love, life, and growing up in the 80's. Mature content recommended for ages 14 and up.
author: Michelle M. McCorkle
